stimulusHtml: Which of the following ethical guidelines did the therapist violate by disregarding Ezra’s right to privacy?

features.html: Ezra’s therapist recommended some techniques to help Ezra cope with his anxiety. Ezra observed a positive change in his symptoms following the treatment. While waiting for his appointment in the waiting room he notices an article his therapist had authored referencing Ezra’s case and using his name.

choicesHtml: Respect for people’s rights and dignity
